name: solar-emergence
description: Solar Emergence: 4-layer emergent intelligence system with multimodal pattern discovery

scripts.knowledge-stats: node -e "const {KnowledgeLoader} = require('./.bmad-core/utils/knowledge-loader.js'); const loader = new KnowledgeLoader(); console.log('Knowledge Stats:', JSON.stringify(loader.getKnowledgeStats(), null, 2));"
scripts.validate-constraints: node -e "const {KnowledgeLoader} = require('./.bmad-core/utils/knowledge-loader.js'); const loader = new KnowledgeLoader(); console.log('Testing constraint compliance...'); console.log('OpenAI API:', loader.isConstraintCompliant('OpenAI API')); console.log('Whisper.cpp:', loader.isConstraintCompliant('Whisper.cpp local processing'));"
scripts.search-knowledge: node -e "const {KnowledgeLoader} = require('./.bmad-core/utils/knowledge-loader.js'); const term = process.argv[1] || 'local'; const loader = new KnowledgeLoader(); console.log('Search results for \"' + term + '\":', JSON.stringify(loader.searchKnowledge(term), null, 2));"
scripts.project-status: node -e "const {KnowledgeLoader} = require('./.bmad-core/utils/knowledge-loader.js'); const loader = new KnowledgeLoader(); console.log('Project Status:', JSON.stringify(loader.getProjectStatus(), null, 2));"

author: Solar Emergence Project
